Description.Text: Location This hotel is located just 10 minutes from the Museo del Desierto (Desert Museum), around 45 minutes from the centre of Monterrey and approximately 15 minutes from the airport. Facilities Guests can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 54 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a safe, a currency exchange service, a restaurant, a café, medical assistance, room service and a laundry service. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. There is also a garden. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms Rooms feature a bathroom. A double bed ensures a good night's sleep. Features include internet access and a TV. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. The bathroom offers convenient facilities including a shower. Special family rooms are available for families with children. Meals Guests can choose options including breakfast and dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the accommodation: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.
